original_text: For the day of the Lord of hosts shall be upon every one that is proud and lofty, and upon every one that is lifted up; and he shall be brought low:
korean_text: 대저 만군의 여호와의 날이 모든 교만한 자와 거만한 자와 자고한 자에게 임하리니 그들이 낮아지리라

sentences.original_text: For the day of the Lord of hosts
shall be upon every one that is proud
and upon every one that is lifted up
and he shall be brought low
